casebody.data:
Stone, Appellant, v. Medaglia-Dell, Appellee, et al.

[Cite as Stone v. Medaglia-Dell, 97 Ohio St.3d 1218, 2002-Ohio-6296.]

*1219(No. 2001-1300 Submitted September 24, 2002 Decided December 4, 2002.) Nurenberg, Plevin, Heller & McCarthy Co., L.P.A., and Kathleen J. St. John, for appellant. Fifner & Associates and Timothy P. Whitford, for appellee.

{¶ 1} The cause is dismissed, sua sponte, as having been improvidently allowed.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur. Resnick and F.E. Sweeney, JJ., dissent and would reverse the judgment of the court of appeals.
